known_issues: Backend connection failure: users receiving 'Unable to connect to backend' error in production (Version 16)

existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix the 'Unable to connect to backend' error that users are experiencing in production. Ensure the backend actor is correctly initialized and that the canister ID environment variables are properly wired so the frontend can establish a connection to the Motoko backend on page load.

projectName: Fix backend connection failure ('Unable to connect to backend')
